articles.title: This Simple Daily Habit Could Add Up to 11 Years to Your Life - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Increasing physical activity to the levels of the most active quarter of Americans over 40 could add up to 11 years to a person's life, according to a study using data from national health surveys. Walking just over two and a half hours daily could significan…
articles.content: A study reveals that matching the physical activity of the most active older adults could extend life expectancy by up to 11 years. Researchers recommend enhancing public infrastructure to facilitate… [+4548 chars]
